contexts.context: ..., fully aware of Gothren's growing rage, which that particular <mark>comment</mark> had only enflamed. "He wasn't used to Khajiit either....
...Or their dark sense of humor. He took some sarcastic <mark>comments</mark> from Master S'Rabba literally, and we all ended up being...
...it. Much better to admire the quality of workmanship, but <mark>comment</mark> that, regretfully, you simply cannot afford such a price....
